title: Did Iowa High School students have to apologize for wearing national colors?
subtitle: The conflicting reports of Iowa High School students are assumed to have been forced to apologize for wearing red, white and blue clothes in a basketball match that led to social media arguments.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: The Iowa high school students had to apologize for wearing red, white and blue in a sports match because the immigrant students in the opposite team were offended.
